rows.label: tev100901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Professor B about Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Professor B about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0001
rows.name:
In my time, most of the galaxies have already been
charted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0002
rows.name:
But these indigenous Nopon creatures!
And the 8%»$ that envelops this planet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0003
rows.name:
I've never heard of a world like this.
I've never even heard of a GALAXY like this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0004
rows.name:
And those results from the =#o±$4\\\\›*...
This world may hold far deeper secrets than
we'd ever conceived of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0005
rows.name:
You cannot imagine what a thrill it will be for me to
solve this world's myriad mysteries![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0009
rows.name:
A scientist of my caliber should not be wasting his
time on such mundane tasks as running a business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0010
rows.name:
But out of an abundance of pity for Graham, I have
opened an arms-manufacturing company to repay the
debt that sad little fellow is always going on about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0011
rows.name: I have dubbed it "Factory 1.21." Splendid name, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0012
rows.name:
The company sells armaments that have been created
using my knowledge of the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0013
rows.name:
You and your little BLADE friends would be wise to
buy them in vast quantities, and be eternally grateful
that I've deigned to sell them at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Professor B about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0014
rows.name:
You have my thanks yet again. I suppose at this point
I am quite in your debt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0015
rows.name:
Therefore, as a special reward, I will give you access
to even more of my Factory 1.21's extraordinary wares![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0016
rows.name:
Are you...expecting some sort of a handout? You fool!
Go to a shop and pay for them yourself already!
I can't be passing these things around like candy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0017
rows.name:
Don't you realize how fortunate you BLADEs are?
In this whole vast universe, do you think anyone else is
able to purchase arms made by a man of the FUTURE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev100901_MSG0018
rows.name:
So go on now! Off to the shops with you!
Enjoy my fine wares, you lucky, lucky individual.[ST:wait ]
